DOC.brief_summary: To assess safety ( especially skin finding ) pharmacokinetics apply 0.3 % , 1 % , 3 % formulation 5g OPA-15406 ointment 1000 cm2 area single-dose multiple-dose twice daily 2 week Japanese healthy adult male subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Trial OPA-15406 Ointment Healthy Adult Male Subjects
